channel.title: Comments on: [WordPress]wp-flickr-pressのバージョン1.3.2をリリース

item.title: By: 深田 達也(Tatsuya Fukata)

item.description:

I'll add when the next release.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Octo Tako.

Oh, OK.

I’ll add when the next release.

item.title: By: Octo Tako
item.dc:creator: Octo Tako
item.description:
u forgot to mention it here ^^
http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/wp-flickr-press/installation/
Download the plugin, unpack it and upload the 'wp-flickr-press' folder to your wp-content/plugins directory.
To grant write access to wp-content/plugins/wp-flickr-press/cache. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress. Go to [Settings] -> [FlickrPress] to configure the options.
this is the best flickr plugin i found after tantan flickr discontinued. ^^
item.content:encoded:
u forgot to mention it here ^^

http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/wp-flickr-press/installation/

Download the plugin, unpack it and upload the ‘wp-flickr-press’ folder to your wp-content/plugins directory.

To grant write access to wp-content/plugins/wp-flickr-press/cache.
Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
Go to [Settings] -> [FlickrPress] to configure the options.

this is the best flickr plugin i found after tantan flickr discontinued. ^^

item.title: By: Octo Tako
item.dc:creator: Octo Tako
item.description:
oh.. i need to set that in Flickr http://www.flickr.com/services/apps/. you should mention that in installation guide.
thanks . it's working now . arigato gozaimasu
item.content:encoded:
oh.. i need to set that in Flickr http://www.flickr.com/services/apps/.
you should mention that in installation guide.

thanks . it’s working now  . arigato gozaimasu

item.title: By: 深田 達也(Tatsuya Fukata)
item.dc:creator: 深田 達也(Tatsuya Fukata)
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/archives/5860/comment-page-1/#comment-708">Octo Tako</a>.
Hi, Octo Tako
Did you set the OAuth callback URL to the Flickr app?
In addition, URL's management screen below is your blog? http://[Your/ Blog Domain]/wp-admin/
If, http://[Your/ Blog Domain]/[XXX]/wp-admin/, callback URL, please set as follows.
http://[Your/ Blog Domain]/[XXX]/wp-content/plugins/wp-flickr-press/flickr_oauth_callback.php
Thank you
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Octo Tako.

Hi, Octo Tako

Did you set the OAuth callback URL to the Flickr app?

In addition, URL’s management screen below is your blog?
http://[Your/ Blog Domain]/wp-admin/

If, http://[Your/ Blog Domain]/[XXX]/wp-admin/, callback URL, please set as follows.

http://[Your/ Blog Domain]/[XXX]/wp-content/plugins/wp-flickr-press/flickr_oauth_callback.php

Thank you

item.title: By: Octo Tako
item.dc:creator: Octo Tako
item.description:
api key and secret is already inserted. when i click http://domain/wp-content/plugins/wp-flickr-press/flickr_oauth_callback.php it gives me blank page.
when i click update oath token still error Oops! Flickr can't find a valid callback URL.
item.content:encoded:
api key and secret is already inserted.
when i click http://domain/wp-content/plugins/wp-flickr-press/flickr_oauth_callback.php
it gives me blank page.

when i click update oath token still error Oops! Flickr can’t find a valid callback URL.

item.title: By: 深田 達也(Tatsuya Fukata)
item.dc:creator: 深田 達也(Tatsuya Fukata)
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/archives/5860/comment-page-1/#comment-706">Octo Tako</a>.
Hi,
First, I created a Flickr app for yourself from the following URL?
http://www.flickr.com/services/apps/create/apply
Then I created the app was set CallbackURL? URL should be set as follows.
http://[Your/ Blog Domain]/wp-content/plugins/wp-flickr-press/flickr_oauth_callback.php
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Octo Tako.

Hi,

First, I created a Flickr app for yourself from the following URL?

http://www.flickr.com/services/apps/create/apply

Then I created the app was set CallbackURL?
URL should be set as follows.

http://[Your/ Blog Domain]/wp-content/plugins/wp-flickr-press/flickr_oauth_callback.php

item.title: By: Octo Tako
item.dc:creator: Octo Tako
item.description:
when i try to update oath token , flickr give me this error
Oops! Flickr can't find a valid callback URL.
An external application has requested your login credentials and permission to perform certain actions on your behalf, but has failed to include all the required data.
item.content:encoded:
when i try to update oath token , flickr give me this error

Oops! Flickr can’t find a valid callback URL.

An external application has requested your login
credentials and permission to perform certain actions on your behalf,
but has failed to include all the required data.
